document_data.name: Fellowship of the Forgotten Flower
document_data.mainbody: The '''Fellowship of the Forgotten Flower''' was a loosely structured [[elf|elven]] [[knight]]ly order that operated on mainland [[Faerûn]].
document_data.Activities: The Fellowship was dedicated to recovering lost elven relics from long-abandoned elven realms.
document_data.History: With the majority of elven knighthoods having migrated to [[Evermeet]] following [[the Retreat]], the Fellowship's choice to remain on mainland Faerûn made them one of the most frequently encountered elven knighthoods on the continent outside of elven lands.
